caption.title: Heatmap displaying the variation of the relative content of phenylpropanoid and aromatic compounds detected in the extracted essential oil from fibrous roots of A. heterotropoides var. mandshuricum grown in four light conditions.
caption.p: Plot colors reflect the proportion of the detected metabolites within the essential oil, ranging from low (black) to high (red). Black means not detected. Treatment I, 100% full sunlight; Treatment II, 50% full sunlight; Treatment III, 24% full sunlight; Treatment IV, 12% full sunlight.
